content:
You're welcome! I'm excited to hear that you're eager to start building your album. Remember to have fun and be creative with your project. The resources I mentioned should provide a great starting point for finding interesting information and images to complement your stamps.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance. When you do find out which country issued the Galactic Odyssey stamps, feel free to share the information with me. I'm curious to know!

Good luck with your album, and happy collecting!
